entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
